record.title: RECESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate stands in recess until the hour of 2:15 p.m.
Thereupon, at 12:28 p.m., the Senate recessed until 2:15 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. Carper.)

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak for up to 10 minutes in morning business.

record.chair: The Chair hears none, and it is so ordered.
